---
id: update-workflow-step
title: "Update workflow step"
description: "Updates an existing workflow step or creates it if it doesn't exist (upsert behavior)."
sidebar_label: "Update workflow step"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update workflow step"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/steps/{workflowStepId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing workflow step or creates it if it doesn't exist (upsert behavior).

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Authentication**: Requires authenticated user with workflow management permissions.

**Request Body**: Submit a `WorkflowStep` object. The `WorkflowStepId` in the path takes precedence.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workflowStepId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the workflow step to retrieve, update, or delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"eeeeeeee-ffff-0000-1111-222222222222"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Complete workflow step (status) definition including actions and next-step mappings.","properties":{"OriginalWorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Original step ID if this step was copied from another workflow."},"WorkflowId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the workflow that owns this step."},"WorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the workflow step."},"WorkflowName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the parent workflow.","example":"Device Onboarding Workflow"},"StepName":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the workflow step.","example":"Submit Request"},"StepDescription":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description explaining when this step should be used.","example":"User submits a device request for processing."},"IsClosed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether tickets in this step are considered closed."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Flag indicating if the step has been soft-deleted."},"StatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Legacy status identifier associated with the step."},"StatusName":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the associated status.","example":"Open"},"CommandName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional command name displayed in the workflow menu.","example":"Submit"},"CommandSortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Ordering of the command within the workflow menu."},"CommandMore":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the command should surface in the overflow/more menu."},"CommandApprovalTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Approval type required when transitioning to this step."},"CommandApprovalStage":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Approval stage number for multi-stage approval workflows."},"DisplayOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Ordering of the step in UI pickers and lists."},"SourceEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity type identifier for the source system."},"SourceEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity identifier from the source system."},"Actions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines an automated action that executes when a ticket enters a workflow step.","properties":{"WorkflowStepActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this action."},"WorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Workflow step that triggers this action."},"WorkflowActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Type of action to perform (e.g., send email, assign ticket)."},"WorkflowActionTypeName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display name of the action type.","example":"Send Email Notification"},"Options":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON string containing action-specific configuration options."},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Order in which actions execute within a step."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the action was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the action was last modified."}},"required":["WorkflowStepActionId","WorkflowStepId","WorkflowActionTypeId","SortOrder"],"title":"WorkflowStepAction"},"description":"Collection of automated actions triggered when entering this step."},"NextSteps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines an allowed transition from one workflow step to another.","properties":{"WorkflowNextStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this next-step mapping."},"WorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Source workflow step from which this transition originates."},"AllowedNextWorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Target workflow step that can be transitioned to."},"IsAllActionsCompleteRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, all step actions must be completed before this transition is allowed."},"StepName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display name of the target step for convenience.","example":"In Progress"},"SourceEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity type identifier for the source system."},"SourceEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity identifier from the source system."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the mapping was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the mapping was last modified."}},"required":["WorkflowNextStepId","WorkflowStepId","AllowedNextWorkflowStepId","IsAllActionsCompleteRequired"],"title":"WorkflowNextStep"},"description":"Collection of allowed next-step transitions from this step."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the step was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the step was last modified."},"OriginId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the source record if migrated from another system."},"OriginSource":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Describes the origin system for migrated workflow steps."},"Color":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Hex color code used to render the step in the UI.","example":"#72DBF8"}},"required":["WorkflowId","WorkflowStepId","StepName","IsClosed","IsDeleted","StatusId","DisplayOrder"],"title":"WorkflowStepFull"},"example":{"WorkflowStepId":"eeeeeeee-ffff-0000-1111-222222222222","WorkflowId":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","StepName":"New - Updated","StepDescription":"Updated description for newly submitted tickets.","StatusId":"aaaaaaaa-1111-2222-3333-444444444444","StatusName":"Open","IsClosed":false,"IsDeleted":false,"DisplayOrder":10,"Color":"#5CB3FF"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
